item.title: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
item.description:
Title: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Lemonpepper Games
Publisher: Lemonpepper Games
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

Adventure across the lush Hawaiian island of Maikai and lead a team of chefs through the challenges of running a pop-up restaurant. Build new relationships and rediscover the bonds that make a kitchen feel like home.

Befriend and recruit a cast of colorful chefs, each with their unique specialties. As you guide them through tropical cooking venues, you’ll uncover their personal stories and witness the bonds that form within this close-knit community. As the chefs collaborate and support one another, their bonds deepen and friendships grow…some may even find unexpected romance.

Whip up some mouthwatering Hawaiian dishes as you explore Maikai's various venues and overcome challenges! Serve Spam Musubi, Mac Salad, Loco Moco, and more. Craft your menu and customize your recipes by adding your own Twists. Optimize your kitchen layout, upgrade your appliances, and level up your chefs' abilities to fully master every kitchen.

Need a break from the kitchen? Strengthen your bond with your team and enjoy what the island has to offer. Go on a fishing trip or a nature hike. Each mini-game lets you grow your relationship with the chefs you befriend on your journey.

Play as either Kai or Kala, two siblings on their quest to bring their family’s restaurant back to life. Along the way, you’ll complete meaningful side quests, experiment with recipes, and craft dishes as unforgettable as the people you’ll meet. Start as the new eatery on the island and grow your restaurant into a local gem.

On Maikai, cooking is more than just preparing meals. It’s about growing relationships and embracing the spirit of community.

  • Cozy Cooking RPG - The narrative focus of visual novel meets strategic kitchen management. Level up characters, customize kitchen layouts, and build relationships to uncover stories.

  • Over 30 Different Kitchens - Cook at beaches, restaurants, malls, food trucks, resorts, and more, all set against the beauty of a lush Hawaiian island.

  • Wholesome and Heartwarming Story - A journey of food, family, and discovering joy in the connections that bring people together.

  • No Stress Kitchen Management - Play at your own pace with a timer that pauses.

  • Grow Relationships - Build stronger bonds between party members or find love with different romantic endings!

  • Mini-games - Participate in island activities like fishing and hiking with fellow chefs.

  • 3 Different Difficulty Settings - Turn off all timers and relax with Cozy mode or test your skills with Hard Boiled mode.

Join our community, report issues, or follow news for the game on Discord!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: macOS Monterey
    • Processor: Intel Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM

item.title: PEPPERED: an existential platformer
item.description:
Title: PEPPERED: an existential platformer
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Free To Play
Developer: Mostly Games
Publisher: Mostly Games , Black Soup
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

ABOUT

PEPPERED is an existential platformer where you have ONE SHOT at everything.

Every choice, every boss battle, and every failure impact the branching plotline and determine how the story will go and how it will end. Will you save the world - or fail miserably?

SYNOPSIS

Seeing apathy in the face of doomsday, an office intern decides to save the world by themselves. But the world responds by summoning the police, angry mobs, and the media, branding them as a terrorist.

KEY FEATURES

■ BRANCHING NARRATIVE
Multiple endings. Multiple story routes. Your failures and choices affect the story, which branches out heavily — sometimes taking you to completely unique locations with unique scenes, characters, or gameplay mechanics.

■ PLATFORMING ACTION
Run. Jump. Die. Scream at the screen.

■ ONE-SHOT BOSS FIGHTS
Challenging boss fights! If you lose, the game will not reset or give you a second chance — it will go on, incorporating your loss and changing the story accordingly.

■ CHOICES
Make story choices, ranging from dialogue responses to actions. These will either affect the characters, the scene's outcome, or the ending you get.

■ STEALTH SECTIONS
Get caught, sneak past, or find a secret solution. Every section features a unique character, permanent outcomes, and dumb gags.

■ EXPLORATION
Immerse yourself in a bizarre world full of weirdos and sad people! Talk with colorful NPCs, poke around the environment, or ignore it all.

■ COMPLETELY RANDOM CR*P
Maybe you'll have to use a shopping cart to run away from thugs? Perhaps you'll have to write a presentation or gamble with a street corner lunatic? Who knows? (I do.)

■ AN OFFICE CHAIR
You can spin in it.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Very mild slapstick violence and cartoony gore (minimal amount.)



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: TBA

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: TBA
* Starting February 15, 2024, the Steam Client will no longer support 32-bit games or macOS 10.14 or lower.

item.title: Slimekeep
item.description:
Title: Slimekeep
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: BenBonk
Publisher: BenBonk
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

Slimekeep is a fast paced action roguelike with a heavy emphasis on decision making and player freedom. Adventure through procedurally generated levels, in a quest to stop the spread of corruption created by the Slime King. You'll have the choice to fight or capture slimes, visit the Slime King's lair, or hold off another day, and so much more. Think Enter the Gungeon meets Slime Rancher , with additional unique mechanics, and elements.

  • Unique Combat:

In Slimekeep, every slime will grow over time. You can decide between letting slimes grow for more resources, at the cost of them becoming more powerful. Or, if you'd like, kill off the slimes early, providing less resources, but making for an easier, and less risky fight. All of this with an array of over 80 unique weapons and upgrades.

  • Slime Pet:

If you'd like to take a more passive route to combat, you can capture slimes with a specially crafted capture gun, capable of extracting essence out of slimes, which can be used to upgrade your slime pet. Choose one, or many paths to build your slime pet around, from brute to assassin to specialty. Craft your slime pet to transform from a simple helper to a full-blown slime destroying machine.

  • Bosses:

Slimekeep contains a cast of 5 unique bosses. Battle against mechs, samurais, or DJs. Each boss is carefully crafted with unique art, animations, attacks, and gimmicks to create a real challenge. And to beat the game, all you have to do is defeat the dreaded slime king, in which you can visit at any time. Sounds simple, right?

  • GREEN (but don't worry the graphics are customizable!)

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Quad Core Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar dedicated graphics card
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: Just have an ok-ish pc and you should be good :)

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: macOS 10.13 or newer
    • Processor: 4 GB RAM
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
    • Additional Notes: Just have an ok-ish mac and you should be good :)

item.title: Lyca
item.description:
Title: Lyca
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Syphono4
Publisher: Syphono4 , Pretty Soon
Franchise: Pretty Soon
Release Date: Apr 7, 2025




About This Game

Lyca is a small, relaxing, incremental game about a magical wolf restoring a barren wasteland into a lush meadow.


Run freely through the grass, gather resources, and explore a vast upgrade tree.

Unlock incredibly powerful upgrades, helpful abilities and valuable resources.

Bring life and rain back into a desolate wasteland.

Enjoy:

  • Incremental progression through resource gathering

  • A vast upgrade tree to explore

  • Unlockable "idle" and "endless" modes

  • Approximately 3-4 hours of gameplay to complete the campaign

  • Simple and relaxing experience

  • Accessible controls: Keyboard, Mouse-Only, and Controller support

  • Lofi royalty-free beats to chill to by Purrple Cat

item.title: Gnomes
item.description:
Title: Gnomes
Genre: Casual , Indie , Strategy
Developer: DYSTOPIAN
Publisher: DYSTOPIAN
Release Date: Apr 4, 2025




About This Game

Defend Your Garden From the Goblin Horde

Use your gnomes to defend your crops from the goblins on a map that expands every day. On your turn, position your gnomes, prepare your defenses and grow your economy. Test your strategy against endless, procedurally generated encounters and survive long enough to face the goblin king.

Every run in Gnomes is created one of a kind and using a carefully crafted combination of bespoke content and procedurally generated elements. Purchase randomly dealt upgrades and create strategic combinations to unlock your build’s potential. As you progress you gain access to more maps and guilds, each with unique gameplay and challenges.

Features:

  • Turn Based Tower Defense

On your turn, you can move your gnomes as often as you like. Use different combinations of relics and plant abilities to help them survive the night.

  • Relics, Crops and Upgrades

Each plant, relic, tool and building creates a different possible synergies. Manipulate your environment an and exploit the resources the map provides you. Grow your economy quickly, but don’t forget to defend it.

  • Diverse Procedurally-Generated Biomes

Distinct biomes with procedurally generated environment, map specific enemies, different hazards and resources. Every run is different.

  • Guilds with Unique Starts

Each guild stars a different type of gnome accompanied by their own starting economy and a game changing relic. Every guild has different strengths and weaknesses. Some will struggle where others thrive.

  • Endless Mode

Test your strategy against randomized waves of enemies that become exponentially more difficult every night. After you defeat the goblin king for the first time, you're given the option to continue your run until the goblins overwhelm you. How many nights can you survive?

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: 2 Cores / 2.0 GHz+
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Storage: 40 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: 2 Cores / 2.5 GHz+
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Storage: 40 MB available space
